ygData.subject: Re: WEAPONS for my PET
ygData.msgSnippet: I used to give my Bone Walk and less pets weapons, they are quite useful.  Shields also when you are wellfunded.  After that I don t see a reason, but there s
ygData.messageBody:
I used to give my Bone Walk and less pets weapons, they are quite
useful. Shields also when you are wellfunded. After that I don't see a
reason, but there's a large debate on whether or not this is good or not.
Basically if you have spares and don't need the cash, go ahead. Just
remember on nonPvP (and usually very difficult on PvP) that you won't be
getting your weapon back, so don't be giving your skel a Combine Dagger or
anything expensive.

Malark on Karana


-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 12:53 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] WEAPONS for my PET


Has anyone given any swords or anything to your pets? I was thinking about
trying to save up for a Mino Axe if you can get the axe back after your skel
is killed. Otherwise I don't think I will use weapons. Or is it more
damage??

Any info on weapons for your pets would be GREAT! Thanks!

-Skel the Gnome (3rd lvl Eci)

WE NECROS "KNOW THE POWER OF THE DARK SIDE!!" hehe had to say it with THE
MOVIE coming out at midnight . . .
